name: Alameda Meals on Wheels
description: Alameda Meals on Wheels delivers nutritious meals to homebound seniors and adults with disabilities in the City of Alameda, providing both nourishment and friendly check-ins.
fullDescription: Alameda Meals on Wheels delivers nutritious meals to homebound seniors and adults with disabilities in the City of Alameda, providing both nourishment and friendly check-ins.
whatTheyOffer:
- Hot lunch delivered Monday-Friday
- Frozen weekend meals
- Friendly volunteer visits and safety checks
- Suggested donation, but no one turned away
- Special diet accommodations available
howToGetIt: Call to apply. You must be 60+ or have a disability and be primarily homebound. A staff member will assess eligibility and schedule deliveries.
